timeline.message: WIP for Cosmos Paged Iterable Handler
Added functionality to provide handler to CosmosPagedFlux and CosmosPagedIterable
Merged latest master and resolved conflicts

timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText: It can't be final as this is optional. We only set this in 1 constructor which is invoked by handle() API.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: you can set it to null in the other constructor.
replies.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText: Yes, that is possible, we can do that.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText:
you will need client builder for session consistency otherwise the test will become flaky.
perhaps clientBuildersWithDirectSession ?
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText: loggger.info is too noisy for the test.
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText:
ditto we should use client builder with at least session, otherwise the test will be flaky.
perhaps clientBuildersWithDirectSession
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText:
for the new test please don't use InternalObjectNode this will be used by the end user.
Please rely on ObjectNode or a simple POJO.
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText:
ditto.
for the new test please don't use InternalObjectNode this will be used by the end user.
Please rely on ObjectNode or a simple POJO.
timeline.author: moderakh
moderakh

replies.bodyText: This cannot be final, because this is mutable. However, we can change it to be immutable, will try that out.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message: Updated tests with ObjectNode and other code review comments
